title.narrative: Burundi - Emergency Energy Project from IDA CRW

description.narrative: The project's development objective (PDO) is to improve the capacity and reliability of electricity generation, transmission, and distribution.

title.narrative: Generation Capacity of Conventional Generation constructed under the project

comment.narrative: The plant was installed in July 2013. The end target has been met.

title.narrative: Average interruption frequency per year in the project area

comment.narrative: The end target has not been met. In addition, 20 interruptions due to the problem of the Bukavu-Goma transmission line in DRCwhich supplies Burundi were recorded by REGIDESO but have not been included here.

title.narrative: Generation capacity of conventional generation constructed

comment.narrative: baseline does not include short term emergency rental power units
The 5Mw thermal plant was commissioned in August 2013. The value includes both the newly installed 5Mw and the existing 5.5Mw inBujumbura
calculated as billing revenues divided by amounts billed

REGIDESO has accumulated unpaid bills from earlier years that need to be written off. The actual value is an estimated one (thevalue of the year 2012). The exact value for the year 2013 will be known by March 2014. The rate is likely to be improved due tothe fully installation of prepaid meters.

title.narrative: Average unplanned interruptions frequency in Bujumbura

comment.narrative: data quality is verified through annual performance contract audits

The end target has not been met. In addition, 20 interruptions due to the problem of the Bukavu-Goma transmission line in DRCwhich supplies Burundi were recorded by REGIDESO but have not been included here.

title.narrative: Increased availability of power supply from the extended Bujumbura thermal power plant (hours/week)

comment.narrative: The end target has been surpassed. The average running hours of the thermal plant is about 140hours/week

title.narrative: Generation capacity of renewable energy rehabilitated

comment.narrative: The rehabilitation of the electromechanical equipment of the existing Rwegura and Nyemanga hydro plants which was financed underthe project was completed in July 2013
The rehabilitation works at the RN1 substation were completed in March 2013.

title.narrative: Pre-payment electricity meters installed by REGIDESO

comment.narrative: It includes both meters installed by REGIDESO under and outside the project as stated in the PAD. In fact, the end target includesmeters installed both by the project and REGIDESO itself. The objective has been met.

title.narrative: Customers served in the project area
Increased electricity generation from the Bujumbura thermal power plant

comment.narrative: The 5MW thermal plant was installed in July 2013 and commissioned on August, 18 2013. The total thermal generation hassignificantly increased compared to the situation in March 2013 (2.17GWh) and in October 2013 (14.6GWh). The end target will bereached by the closing date.
